analysis.description:
BtzToken.totalSupply (/unique_chucks/15/0xe5f867de1ea81346df5181b8b48dd6b0bb3357b0.sol#198-200) shadows:
	- ERC20.totalSupply (/unique_chucks/15/0xe5f867de1ea81346df5181b8b48dd6b0bb3357b0.sol#88)

BtzReceiver.withdrawTokens (/unique_chucks/15/0xe5f867de1ea81346df5181b8b48dd6b0bb3357b0.sol#79-87) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-BTZToken.transfer(_withdrawalAddr,tokensToWithdraw) (/unique_chucks/15/0xe5f867de1ea81346df5181b8b48dd6b0bb3357b0.sol#81-85)

Standard223Token.isContract uses assembly (/unique_chucks/15/0xe5f867de1ea81346df5181b8b48dd6b0bb3357b0.sol#179-190)
	- /unique_chucks/15/0xe5f867de1ea81346df5181b8b48dd6b0bb3357b0.sol#188-190

BtzReceiver.numUsers should be constant (/unique_chucks/15/0xe5f867de1ea81346df5181b8b48dd6b0bb3357b0.sol#10-12)
BtzToken.name should be constant (/unique_chucks/15/0xe5f867de1ea81346df5181b8b48dd6b0bb3357b0.sol#193)

ERC20.totalSupply should be constant (/unique_chucks/15/0xe5f867de1ea81346df5181b8b48dd6b0bb3357b0.sol#88)
